title: Get RID of this leaver bot thing
body: i only got low priority once but for no reason. when i play this game and i have to go for dinner with my family and reasons i get the low priority thing but why do they have it? it will make it unfair for your team but, wouldn't it be easy enough to make it so people can join on going games? put an option where you can ether join a new game and start it or you can join an on going game.

replies.body: The other people will only have an LPQ if they are in a premade with you. If it weren't set up this way, people could easily dodge the queue timer penalties they were given.
